description: This script is designed for testing swap and ZSWAP use cases by running memory allocation and system monitoring tools in an infinite or long-running loop until user intervention.

methods.name: killall
methods.description: Kills all processes matching the name provided.

methods.name: pkill
methods.description: Sends termination signals to processes matching the name provided.

methods.name: ./cpu_loadavg.sh
methods.description: Shell script invoked to record system load averages.

methods.name: ./memstress
methods.description: Memory stress testing utility invoked twice with different parameters.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Reads user input to pause script execution until keypress.
